results.title: Potential benefits of statin therapy in reducing osteoarthritis risk: a Mendelian randomization study.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ use exhibited a protective effect against knee (IVW: beta=-1.056, P=0.004) and @<m>DISEASE_Osteoarthritis_Hip</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015207 @@@hip OA@@@ (IVW: beta = -1.405, P = 0.001).

citations.NLM: Zhang L, Sui L, Li J, Zhang R, Pan W, Lv T. Potential benefits of statin therapy in reducing osteoarthritis risk: a Mendelian randomization study. Arthritis Care Res (Hoboken). 2024 Apr 3;():. PMID: 38570925
